text: (Nampikkaiyāḷarkaḷē! Uṅkaḷ) etirikaḷukku utavi ceyta vētakkārar(kaḷākiya yūtar)kaḷai avarkaḷuṭaiya araṇmaṉaikaḷiliruntu iṟaṅkavaittu avarkaḷuṭaiya uḷḷaṅkaḷil (tiṭukkattaiyum) naṭukkattaiyum pōṭṭuviṭṭāṉ. Ākavē, avarkaḷil oru tokaiyiṉarai nīṅkaḷ veṭṭi viṭṭīrkaḷ; maṟṟoru tokaiyiṉarai nīṅkaḷ ciṟai piṭittīrkaḷ
